long_description: A utilitarian skier's dream, Fischer S-Bound 78 skis get you from point A to point B-with a bunch of fun along the way! Fiberglass wood cores feature air channels that keep weight down while maintaining good strength and durability. Features 5/10 Nordic Rocker camber that gives the skis great turning characteristics and control in variable snow conditions. 5/10 Nordic Rocker indicates that when pressure is applied the ski tips lift 5mm and the location of the ski-to-snow contact point at the front of the skis moves back 10cm. Offtrack Crown waxless pattern on the bases provides good grip while you're touring in fresh snow. Full metal edges dig into hard snow and ice to optimize control on steep terrain. Universal stone grind on the bases of the Fischer S-Bound 78 skis provides good glide in all snow conditions. Photo shows Fischer S-Bound 78 skis with bindings; bindings sold separately.
short_description: A utilitarian skier's dream, Fischer S-Bound 78 skis get you from point A to point B-with a bunch of fun along the way!
